mapper.select: select * from v_ormxmxqhz t1 where ormxmxqhzid=#{id}
select * from v_ormxmxqhz t1 where ormxmxqhzid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`GW`, t1.`ND`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORMXMXQHZID`, t1.`ORMXMXQHZNAME`, t1.`RS`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`XM`, t1.`XMID`, t1.`YF`, t1.`ZZ` FROM `T_ORMXMXQHZ` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.GW, t1.ND, t1.ORGID, t1.ORMXMXQHZID, t1.ORMXMXQHZNAME, t1.RS, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t1.XM, t1.XMID, t1.YF, t1.ZZ FROM T_ORMXMXQHZ t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`GW`, t1.`ND`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORMXMXQHZID`, t1.`ORMXMXQHZNAME`, t1.`RS`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XH`, t1.`XM`, t1.`XMID`, t1.`YF`, t1.`ZZ` FROM `T_ORMXMXQHZ` t1 WHERE ( t1.`XM` <> '0' AND t1.`GW` = #{srf.webcontext.gw} AND t1.`ND` = #{srf.webcontext.nd} AND ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.webcontext.orgid} OR instr((select b.levelcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = t1.orgid), ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.webcontext.orgid')} ) )=1 ) )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.GW, t1.ND, t1.ORGID, t1.ORMXMXQHZID, t1.ORMXMXQHZNAME, t1.RS, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XH, t1.XM, t1.XMID, t1.YF, t1.ZZ FROM T_ORMXMXQHZ t1 WHERE ( t1.XM <> '0' AND t1.GW = #{srf.webcontext.gw} AND t1.ND = #{srf.webcontext.nd} AND ( t1.ORGID = #{srf.webcontext.orgid} OR instr((select b.levelcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = t1.orgid), ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.webcontext.orgid')} ) )=1 ) )
